data: {"page":1,"results":[{"backdrop_path":"/8LlGOPNGmsBaYEksBWaSXqpKFhm.jpg","id":29185,"title":"An Innocent Man","original_title":"An Innocent Man","overview":"Jimmie Rainwood was minding his own business when two corrupt police officers (getting an address wrong) burst into his house, expecting to find a major drug dealer. These are amazingly human-like androids that have been programmed to teach and are supplied with devastatingly effective solutions to discipline problems. On one side, the air traffic controller claims he lost radar contact with the cargo plane shortly before impact, when his screen \"blacked out.\" On the other side, everyone else, including the controller's bosses and the media, put the blame on human error.
